description:
Chika`s "cannon" breaks the deadlock in the three-cornered battle! Faced with the difficult situation, Katori Squad and Kakizaki Squad adopt the strategy of collaboration to defeat Tamakoma-2. However, Osamu`s wires await them. Who will be the first to get the point in the B-Rank Wars Round 5 nighttime match where the overall strength of each team is required?
Source: crunchyroll
